title: Journey - Live In Houston (1981)
description:
Journey concert in Houston Texas in November 1981, 
part of their tour promoting their album "Escape".

This concert, about 76 minutes long, was originally televised on MTV.  
In 2017, some American public television stations have broadcasted it.

Song order: 

01. Intro
02. Escape
03. Line Of Fire
04. Lights
05. Stay Awhile
06. Open Arms
07. Mother, Father
08. Jonathan Cain piano solo
09. Who's Cryin' Now
10. Where Were You
11. Steve Smith drum solo
12. Dead Or Alive
13. Don't Stop Believin'
14. Stone In Love
15. Keep On Runnin'
16. Neal Schon guitar solo
17. Wheel In The Sky
18. Lovin', Touchin', Squeezin'
19. Anyway You Want It

See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Live_in_Houston_1981:_The_Escape_Tour

This torrent has each song as a separate .mkv file.

Another torrent of size 1.68 G is available, 
where the whole concert is one large .mkv file with chapters
